altername_name: Fuuun Mokushiroku: Kakutou Sousei: Savage Reign
name: Savage Reign
overview: Warriors led by destiny finally fight it out in furious fisticuffs! When these warriors collide, they rumble like thunder and strike like lightning. And in the fiercest of battles, the mighty gladiators must struggle to obtain the supreme power or fall by the wayside. As they take on the world, remember to carry a steel umbrella or get pounded by... the Savage Reign.
